languages.text: "Да. Я все подстроил — оставил инфопластину на видном месте и приставил Глейто охранять. Она должна была попасть к тебе в руки, и через свои "неуклюжие попытки понравиться тебе" я снова оказался бы в твоей постели". {n}С безжалостной усмешкой Соломон взирает на вас.{/n}

"Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да. Я все подстроил — оставил инфопластину на видном месте и приставил Глейто охранять. Она должна была попасть к тебе в руки, и через свои "неуклюжие попытки понравиться тебе" я снова оказался бы в твоей постели". {n}С безжалостной усмешкой Соломон взирает на вас.{/n}

"Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうだよ。全部仕組んだことだ。データスレートはわざと見える場所に置き、グライトにはそれを守るように言っておいたんだ。お前にそれを見つけさせ、『ぎこちない求愛劇』で、俺がお前のベッドに戻る―そんな計画だったんだ」{n}ソロモーンは容赦のない薄笑いを浮かべてあなたを見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうだよ。全部仕組んだことだ。データスレートはわざと見える場所に置き、グライトにはそれを守るように言っておいたんだ。お前にそれを見つけさせ、『ぎこちない求愛劇』で、俺がお前のベッドに戻る―そんな計画だったんだ」{n}ソロモーンは容赦のない薄笑いを浮かべてあなたを見た。{/n}

languages.text: "Ja. Es war alles arrangiert – ich habe den Datablock offen herumliegen lassen und Glaito befohlen, ihn zu bewachen. Ihr solltet ihn finden, damit mein 'ungeschicktes Liebeswerben' mich zurück in Euer Bett bringt." {n}Solomorne blickt dich kalt grinsend an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Es war alles arrangiert – ich habe den Datablock offen herumliegen lassen und Glaito befohlen, ihn zu bewachen. Ihr solltet ihn finden, damit mein 'ungeschicktes Liebeswerben' mich zurück in Euer Bett bringt." {n}Solomorne blickt dich kalt grinsend an.{/n}

languages.text: « Oui. Tout était prévu. J'ai laissé la plaque de données à la vue de tous et j'ai ordonné à Glaito de la protéger. L'objectif était que vous la trouviez et que je vous "courtise maladroitement" pour partager votre couche de nouveau. » {n}Solomorne vous regarde avec un sourire narquois.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui. Tout était prévu. J'ai laissé la plaque de données à la vue de tous et j'ai ordonné à Glaito de la protéger. L'objectif était que vous la trouviez et que je vous "courtise maladroitement" pour partager votre couche de nouveau. » {n}Solomorne vous regarde avec un sourire narquois.{/n}

languages.text: «Sí. Todo fue deliberado: dejé la tablilla de datos a la vista y ordené a Glaito que la vigilase. Mi plan consistía en que usted la encontrase y mi "torpe intento de cortejo" me llevase de nuevo a su cama». {n}Solomorne te mira con una sonrisa implacable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Todo fue deliberado: dejé la tablilla de datos a la vista y ordené a Glaito que la vigilase. Mi plan consistía en que usted la encontrase y mi "torpe intento de cortejo" me llevase de nuevo a su cama». {n}Solomorne te mira con una sonrisa implacable.{/n}

languages.text: “没错，这一切都是提前安排好的。是我故意把数据板放在了外面，命令格雷托守着他。我的打算是让你找到它，之后靠着这‘笨拙的求爱’爬上你的床。”{n}索罗蒙得意洋洋地笑着，盯着你，脸上满是冷酷。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错，这一切都是提前安排好的。是我故意把数据板放在了外面，命令格雷托守着他。我的打算是让你找到它，之后靠着这‘笨拙的求爱’爬上你的床。”{n}索罗蒙得意洋洋地笑着，盯着你，脸上满是冷酷。{/n}

languages.text: "Evet. Her şeyi ayarlamıştım. Databelayı ortalıkta bırakıp Glaito'ya onu korumasını emrettim. Senin databelayı bulmanı ve yetersiz kur becerilerime rağmen yatağına tekrar girmeyi planlıyordum. {n}Solomorne sana acımasızca sırıtarak bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes. It was all arranged — I left the data-slate out in the open and ordered Glaito to guard it. The plan was for you to find it and for my 'clumsy courtship' to take me back to your bed." {n}Solomorne looks at you with a ruthless smirk.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Her şeyi ayarlamıştım. Databelayı ortalıkta bırakıp Glaito'ya onu korumasını emrettim. Senin databelayı bulmanı ve yetersiz kur becerilerime rağmen yatağına tekrar girmeyi planlıyordum. {n}Solomorne, sana acımasızca sırıtarak bakıyor.{/n}
